CustomField.description: We have 2 fields to support continuing the Planned Gift ID number values from LCRM in NPSP (Planned Gift Autonumber Backup and PG ID). When a record has a blank value in Planned Gift Autonumber Backup and a value in PG ID, it was a migrated record from LCRM. When a record has a value in both fields and they don't match, it means the record was created during the Delta. It has a value in the Planned Gift Autonumber Backup field, but it was created in LCRM, so it retains that value. When the field values match, it is an entirely new record.
CustomField.label: Planned Gift Autonumber Backup
